lead_paragraph: Travel-related apps are generally better in theory than in practice - at least that's the argument of last week's App Smart column-so you may want to save that $10 for an actual book and not the app.
snippet: Mobile apps from hotels run the gamut, including full-featured ones that let you control the blinds in your room, while others are little more than digital brochures.

headline.main: App Smart Extra: Hotels Check In on Apps

abstract: Mobile apps from hotels run the gamut, including full-featured ones that let you control the blinds in your room, while others are little more than digital brochures.
